name: Vermoidi Innamorati
description:
This is a 1 or 2 player game.
The aim is to solve the maze of each level; in the case of two
active players, the two worms, meeting, both pass the level
following.
However, eating all the tokens in a level will open an exit in a
any point of the labyrinth.
The pieces are placed in different places each time.
Equipped with presentation, interlude and end-game demo.
Possibility to use both keyboard and mouse (left and right button).
Program supplied with 1 small level (1280x800), 1 medium level
(2560x1456) and 1 large level (5120x2768).
Music and sound effects on PC-Speacker.

ONLINE OPTIONS:

Use VERMOIDS /? to know the available options.
For example use VERMOIDS / N to play no music or FX, use
VERMOIDS / X to disable RASTER synchronism, use VERMOIDS nnn (eg.
VERMOIDS 148) to set the freq. video refresh through the IRQ of the
timer.

KEYBOARD OPTIONS (DURING THE GAME):

ENTER: Turn on the first camera.
ESC: Close the first camera.
ARROWS: Direction R / L / D / U Worm1.
P: Pause On / Off (Worm1). If in pause it is possible to scroll the level.
E: Unlock Error x Dead End (Worm1).
S: Change the special text display mode (Worm1).
T: Change the text display mode (Worm1).
O: Waves On / Off (Worm1).

SPACE: Turns on the second camera.
TAB: Close the second camera.
SHIFT + ARROWS, 6,4,2,8: Direction R / L / D / U Worm2.
SHIFT + P: Pause On / Off (Worm2). If in pause it is possible to scroll the level.
SHIFT + E: Unlock error x dead end (Worm2).
SHIFT + S: Change the special text display mode (Verme2).
SHIFT + T: Change the text display mode (Verme2).
SHIFT + O: Waves On / Off (Worm2).

F1, F2: Select 1 or 2 players (1 player camera change).

Paolo Fassin (PCDear.ent.games)
